RubySpec

The standard you trust™

Contributing to RubySpec

The simplest way to get started writing specs is to fork the main Github repo, clone the MSpec repo, and read the documentation here. Once you have written a spec and committed it to your fork, send a pull request.

If you have questions, the quickest response is available in the #rubyspec channel on freenode. Or you can send a message to the mailing list
